extendedInfo.description: SydneyRail is an application that shows the CityRail train time table and map. This app does not require an internet connection so things can load fast and you can use it where reception is poor.We made this application purely for the CityRail next train screen we see at CityRail stations (See Trains on the Main Menu). Its purpose has now changed to providing the next trains to a station information as quick as we can. A widget is coming.This is a beta version, released for comments and testing. So time table data may not be 100% correct.Please report all bugs to us, send an email too (it helps speed things along, Android bug tracking isn't particularly helpful all the time)This is merely the start of this program (well in a usable form at least)Lots more additions/enhancements will be added laterIf you leave negative feedback, its always appreciated to leave helpful negative feedback, either give us an email or write it in the comment, what is wrong with the app. Please don't just say "I don't like it".Features:- Main screen showing a customisable list of next trains.- Train screen showing train stops and following trains.- Map of City Rail network.- Offline stored view of the City Rail time table.- Track work information (Requires online connectivity).- Service status (Requires online connectivity).- Widgets showing next train information.

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Works really well. One thing to make it better would be to be able to scroll back through earlier trains so you can a work out your arrival time more easily on the train you are currently on..
reviews.author: Martin Visser

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: I moved from Perth to Sydney a month ago. It reallt helps me. Thanks:)

reviews.title: Waste of money and don\'t depend on it...
reviews.comment: Waste of money and don\'t depend on it... Got no info at all... Useless app, use trip view

reviews.title: Wtf
reviews.comment: Are you even up to date with the time table. I travel late and you say there are no trains. Smd there are still many train. Your a joke.

reviews.title: Update needed
reviews.comment: This app is okay, it needs to be updated way more than it is! It is so frustrating when your app says there is a train when there really isn\'t one for another half an hour. Fix this and you get a 5 star app.
